item.title: Your Coronavirus FAQs, Answered: Wearing Masks, Canceling Air Travel, and More
item.description: The ongoing outbreak of a newly discovered, sometimes fatal coronavirus has many people wondering how much they should be altering their daily lives to avoid infection. As the disease known as COVID-19 has begun spreading locally in parts of the U.S., weâ€™ve compiled answers to commonly asked questions submitted by our readers, friends, and coworkers. Q: How long can the virus survive on surfaces? Do disinfectant sprays and wipes work against it?
